Hello To All Samurai Historian's,
    I am wishing that someone might be able to assist me in my quest to find
the origin of this Tokugawa Keisu Bowl.It was a gift to me about 6 years ago
from a lady who has since passed away and the history of the bowl along with
her.The last home that i know of for them both was
Iddesleigh,Winkleigh,Devon England.I have since found it to be from the
Tokugawa Shogunate because Mon. It has 4 of the circle Hollyhock lleaf's and
2 water dragons etched around the sides of it.
    It is vert large 2ft tall and wide and weighs 50 lbs.The stand is
2ft tall as well.
  Any assistance that you could provide would be greatly appriciated.I
do wish to sell it if anyone is interested please feel free to email
me .
       Thank You and Warm Wishes  Holly Lange
